duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement AWS services in a variety of distributed computing environments with design and implementation experience.
Automate large-scale implementation and migration of Data Center to Cloud Infrastructure through DevOps scripting and terraform IaC deployments.
Build and configure CI/CD (Gitlab, Jenkins) and deployment automation.
Administer Linux / Windows-based systems in a Cloud or Virtualized environment.
Work on FedRamp compliant projects and configure tools such as Palo, Panorama, Splunk, and Tenable.
Participate in code release, production deployment, and aggressive approach to fixing bugs and defects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
